thing-type.label: Event log
thing-type.description:
A virtual thing that allows reading records from the alarm system event log.
Event log must read sequentially starting from the most recent record.

channel-type.label: Current index
channel-type.description: Index of the current record in the event log. Send '-1' to get most recent record.

channel-type.label: Previous index
channel-type.description: Index of the previous record in the event log. Use this value to iterate over the log.

channel-type.label: Date and time
channel-type.description: Date and time when the event happened.

channel-type.label: Details
channel-type.description: Additional details about the event, like names of partitions, zones, users, etc.
